document_title: Foreskin inflammation: Causes, signs and prevention
subsection_name: viem-bao-quy-dau.json_4_Who is at risk of getting the disease?
subsection_content:
Factors that increase the risk of balanitis include:
Have diabetes but do not treat it or have poor blood sugar control; Having sexually transmitted diseases such as Herpes and gonorrhea.
